note.p: Birth: Lappi parish, near Rauma, Finland (? 1705)
Education: Academy of Turku, Finland. MA (1729), PhD (1735)

Career: Met Christian Wolff, German philosopher, in Marburg (1737); Professor of Philosophy, Academy of Turku (1738-1744) by Wolff's recommendation, but never taught there; travelled in France, Italy and England, including London (1740-1741); killed in a fire in Paris

References: Jorma Vallinkoski, 'Juhana Welin, wolffilainen filosofi, runoilija ja seikkailija' = 'Juhana Welin, Wolffian philopher, poet and adventurer', in Historiallinen Arkisto 52 (Helsinki, 1947), pp. 213-276
In preparation: Dr Jyrki Siukonen, Edition of Welin's philosophical papers, with biography
